name: Eleonor's Nightmares
description:
A fractured family, a lonely little girl, a mystery beyond the walls of dreams...
Something is happening, and it doesn't seem to be good. Explore Molly Eleonor's nightmares, find the truth and, more importantly, do not die. Enjoy this new and scary adventure, you won't sleep again.

Welcome to your new... and last adventure

Play as Eleonor, a lonely little girl, in a terrifying first-person adventure and try to survive while escaping from... her dreams??


Nightmares all around every corner

This horror game is full of tense moments, scary jumpscares, and nightmare scenarios...
Each level is unique, you will have to look for keys, watch your steps, or even take costumes to go unnoticed.

I think that... I'm not alone?!?

Someone is watching, don't be scared. If you see... that; hide or run, it is fast, truly fast...
Take your flashlight and... those strange letters? Solve puzzles, discover the truth and escape from this dreadful mystery, it does not feel unreal...

Mysterious mechanics that will help you survive

Hide inside lockers, use portals or just... look at them. It all depends on what nightmare you are in.


All I see is darkness...

Just a flashlight, nothing else. Use it to explore and look for the things you need to escape but, use it wisely; it's not unlimited...


Is this going to finish?!?

Explore four different nightmares while you look for keys to open the secret door; but remember, do not forget to watch your steps...
